modName: Amulet of kings - Not Ported - wip
summary: The Court of the Dragons Have prayed for balance and true power, now that power has returned and so has the Darkness that looms over Skyrim that wishes to rise once again.
descriptionHtml:
You can get this in Queen Elisifs bedroom in the Blue palace of Solitude. It is not yet able to be worn over some armors, mostly because i havent gtten the size just right, for now it gives you the Blessing of Akatosh which increases Magica, but i will also make an enchant for it soon.
This will add my version of the Amulet of Kings into Skyrim, its is a Work in Progress and i will release an update some time this weekend when i have more time to work.
author: Me
